settings.editor: Celebrate the splendour of an early morning with desertdaytravels Tourism as you watch the golden dunes of Dubai's desert glisten in the rays of the rising sun. Morning Desert Safari Dubai also brings you the option to see the beauty of the Dubai desert in the morning, with a nice climate and an unrushed desert area. This private morning safari in Dubai lets you experience the beauty of the red sand dunes of the city.

settings.editor:
What to expect

Morning Desert Safari with desertdaytravels beckons you with breathtaking sights of the desert as it takes on a golden hue when the sun first peeks at us through the morning sky. Escape into the tranquillity of the vast Arabian Desert. The desert basks in the glory of the sunlight as we take you on a ride across the dunes.

A truly enchanting day awaits you after we pick you up from your location in Dubai. Experience the amazing contrast that a holiday in Dubai offers as you leave the glamour of the glittering city behind and head for the desert shrouded in an eerie silence. Then, admiring the beauty of the desert landscape and its flora and fauna, brace yourself for a rush of adrenaline as we take you on a 45-minute dune bashing session in a roaring 4x4 drive vehicle. Scream your hearts out as your vehicle sinks into the lows of the dunes and zooms up in minutes- an experience no less thrilling than a roller coaster ride.

Hold on, the Morning Desert Safari still has a lot more laid ahead for you that makes the experience special indeed. We usher you into a campsite inspired by the life of the enigmatic Bedouins. Together with, experience the Arabian desert culture up close to the camp. If dune bashing hasn't quenched your thirst yet for thrill and adventure, go quad biking or sandboarding. Also, if you’re pining for a more relaxing activity, we won’t disappoint you either. At last, sway through the undulating desert land riding on the back of a friendly camels.

Points to Note

  • Pregnant women and those with backaches are advised to skip this activity.
  • No lunch is included in the Morning Desert Safari Dubai package.
  • You may be picked up from any location other than your hotel or residence after paying an additional charge.
  • The duration of the activity is approximately 3 hours.
  • The language of communication with the tour operators during the activity is English or Arabic.
  • The safari starts at 8:30 am sharp.

Morning Safari with Dune Buggy (Private)

Embark on an adrenaline-fueled adventure with a Morning Safari that includes a private Dune Buggy ride. Navigate through the vast desert terrains, tackling the dunes for an exhilarating experience that combines speed with the stunning desert landscape.

Morning Safari with Camel Ride and 350 cc Quad Bike (Private/ Sharing)

Start your day with a unique combination of traditional and modern desert experiences. Enjoy a serene camel ride in Dubai, followed by an action-packed journey on a 350 cc quad bike, available for both private and shared groups, through the sprawling dunes.

Morning Safari with 150 cc Quad Bike (Private)

Gear up for an exclusive Morning Safari featuring a private 150 cc Quad Bike adventure. This safari is tailored for enthusiasts seeking a thrilling ride through the desert's challenging landscapes, offering an unforgettable start to the day.

Morning Safari with 350 cc Quad Bike (Private)

Elevate your desert adventure with a Morning Safari on a powerful 350 cc Quad Bike. This private experience provides an unparalleled opportunity to explore the vast dunes at your own pace, delivering both excitement and exclusivity.

Morning Safari with Camel Ride (Private)

Immerse yourself in the tranquillity of the desert with a private Morning Safari that includes a camel ride. This peaceful journey on the 'ship of the desert' offers a glimpse into the traditional mode of desert navigation, set against the backdrop of the stunning sunrise.

 Sunrise Desert Safari Adventure Dubai

In the Sunrise Desert Safari Dubai package you will enjoy the beauty of the sun. Also, along with it you will escape into peace and get a relaxed feeling. Here you will have plenty of amazing stops where you can click pictures and create lifelong memories. Moreover, at this time you will go for camel rides, dune buggies and quad biking by paying extra charges. Overall, the sunrise desert safari is the finest time to explore deserts along with enjoying the beautiful sun-rising scene.

What’s the Best Time of the Year to Visit?

The Morning Desert Safari is an outdoor activity. That's why the weather matters. The weather in Dubai is at its best between October and February. True, the city is indeed a bit crowded then, as the Dubai Duty-Free Shopping Festival is held during this time itself. Moreover, the schools are going on vacation, and the streets in Dubai are full of tourists and locals enjoying evenings with family and friends. However, if you can handle the crowd, the best time to go for the Morning Desert Safari is between October and February, So must visit this tourist attraction in Dubai for an amazing experience.

Why you should opt for this

  • The Morning Desert Safari allows you to experience the desert in its grandest splendour and its purest form when the weather is pleasant.
  • It's the best way to admire the beauty of the desert within a limited time, as it's over by the afternoon.
  • It’s just the right balance between thrill & adventure in the form of dune bashing and relaxation in the form of a leisurely camel ride.
  • Mingle with other guests and learn about the way of life in various parts of the world at the camping site.

Other important information

  • You may opt for either shared or private transportation services. Choose the option accordingly. Private Morning Safari Dubai is also available.
  • Depending on the traffic conditions, the time of pickup or drop off may be changed by around 30 to 60 minutes.

FAQs

Q. What time does the Morning Desert Safari in Dubai start?

The tour usually starts early in the morning, around 6:00 or 7:00 AM. However, the exact starting time can vary depending on the tour operator and the season. The tour begins before sunrise so that you can view the beautiful sunrise in the desert.

Q. How long does the Morning Desert Safari in Dubai last?

The duration of this tour typically lasts for 3 to 4 hours. After that, you will be dropped off at your hotel. The tour is not hectic at all, and you will also get some time to take breaks between activities.

Q. Is it safe to go on a morning safari trip?

Yes, this safari trip is safe. We at desertdaytravels Tourism provide trained and experienced guides who ensure the safety of visitors during the activities. However, we recommend following the instructions of the guide and wearing appropriate clothing and footwear. The activity does not involve anything dangerous, as you will receive a good amount of supervision from professionals. Also, people with back problems should not go for dune bashing at all.

Q. What should I wear for this tour?

You should wear comfortable and loose-fitting clothing that covers your arms and legs to protect you from the sun, sand, and debris. Additionally, prefer closed-toe shoes to protect your feet during private morning safari Dubai. Also, bring a hat and sunglasses to keep your face and eyes safe from the sun. Do not wear short or revealing outfits that follow the local culture.

Q. What activities are included in the Morning Desert Safari in Dubai?

The activities included in the Morning Safari can vary depending on the package you choose. Generally, the safari includes dune bashing and camel riding. Furthermore, food is available as per the selected package.

Q. Is hotel pick-up and drop-off included in the private morning safari Dubai?

Yes, we at desertdaytravels Tourism provide hotel pick-up and drop-off services as part of our package.  We have both sharing and private transfer options that you can choose from when booking the tickets.  Make sure to select a suitable choice when you are making your bookings.

Q. What is the cost of the Morning Desert Safari in Dubai or sunrise desert safari ?

The cost of the Morning Desert Safari in Dubai can vary depending on the tour operator and the package you choose. Generally, the cost can range from AED 200 to AED 400 per person. Ask the tour operator before booking to know the exact cost and inclusions in the package. You can pick as per your budget and then make bookings.
